AR 44. When preparing the information on the percentage of Scope 1 GHG emissions from regulated
emission trading schemes required under paragraph 48 (b), the undertaking shall:
(a) consider GHG emissions from the installations it operates that are subject to regulated
Emission Trading Schemes (ETS), including the EU-ETS, national ETS and non-EU
ETS, if applicable;
(b) only include emissions of CO , CH , N O, HFCs, PFCs, SF , and NF ;
